title: Send to Sidebar from canvas
description:
Add 'Send to Sidebar' button on canvas terminal to transfer back to sidebar.

## Implementation Pattern
1. Add button to canvas terminal header (CanvasTerminal.tsx)
2. On click: call backend API to set `owner: 'sidebar'`
3. Canvas removes terminal from view
4. Sidebar receives `terminal-ownership-transferred` message
5. Sidebar renders terminal normally

## Existing Infrastructure
- `terminal-ownership-transferred` WebSocket message
- `owner` field already on TerminalSession type
- Canvas state sync already handled in useTerminalSessions.ts

## Key Files
- tabz-canvas: src/components/CanvasTerminal.tsx (add button)
- TabzChrome: extension/hooks/useTerminalSessions.ts (message handler)

## Coordination
- Canvas side: POST to backend with owner change
- Backend: broadcast ownership change to all clients
- Sidebar: receives message and starts rendering

## BRANCH: Work on TabzChrome `canvas` branch for backend/extension changes
Canvas UI changes go to tabz-canvas main.

title: Send to Canvas from TabzChrome sidebar
description:
Add 'Send to Canvas' button in TabzChrome sidebar to transfer terminal to canvas.

## Implementation Pattern (from existing popout/3D patterns)
1. Add button to terminal header in sidebar
2. On click: set `owner: 'canvas'` via WebSocket message
3. Sidebar shows ghost badge placeholder (like popout does)
4. Canvas receives `terminal-ownership-transferred` message
5. Canvas renders terminal at default/specified position

## Existing Infrastructure (already in codebase\!)
- `CanvasState` interface: x, y, width, height, zIndex, visible
- `owner: 'sidebar' | 'canvas'` field on TerminalSession
- `terminal-ownership-transferred` WebSocket message type
- Ghost badge pattern from PopoutTerminalView

## Key Files
- extension/hooks/useTerminalSessions.ts (lines 494-528)
- extension/components/PopoutTerminalView.tsx (ghost badge pattern)
- extension/sidepanel/sidepanel.tsx (button placement)

## BRANCH: Work on TabzChrome `canvas` branch
Do NOT commit to TabzChrome main.
